arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} chance to create a {c_important}Mystic Circle{/c} for {c_number}[PowerTag.Spiritborn_RuneArea."Script Formula 5"]{/c} seconds. 

Casting a {c_important}Eagle{/c} Skill in {c_important}Mystic Circles{/c} empowers them to move with you and explode for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1 * (1 + Owner.Bonus_Percent_Per_Power#Spiritborn_RuneArea)]{/c} Lightning damage when you {c_important}Evade{/c}.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} chance to create a {c_important}Mystic Circle{/c} for {c_number}[PowerTag.Spiritborn_RuneArea."Script Formula 5"]{/c} seconds. 

Casting a {c_important}Eagle{/c} Skill in {c_important}Mystic Circles{/c} empowers them to move with you and explode for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1 * (1 + Owner.Bonus_Percent_Per_Power#Spiritborn_RuneArea)]{/c} Lightning damage when you {c_important}Evade{/c}.
